DataElement.preferredDefinition: A subscale complement to the FACT-G questionnaire developed specifically for evaluating quality of life of bone marrow transplant (BMT) patients._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
